definition: approximate number/imprecise indication of quantity (e.g. 十幾|十几[shi2 ji3], 兩三百|两三百[liang3 san1 bai3], 一千多[yi1 qian1 duo1])
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Administration middle , data in the past many are approximate numbers , are a qualitative judgement.
sentences.chinese: 以往的管理中，數據很多是概數，是定性的判斷。
“左右”放在數字後面表示概數。
